website_summaries.verdict: This is a powerful cordless vacuum that's perfect for keeping in your car or for tackling small messes at home.
pros: Crevice tool, upholstery tool, and telescoping extension wand included
Excellent at picking up pet hair
Powerful suction in a compact machine
cons: This vacuum has a run time of about 15 minutes, so it's only useful for small jobs

customer_reviews.title: Charging is a Problem
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum was great and worked well for a couple of months. Last week I left it charging overnight, and now it doesn't work more than a few seconds before turning off. Since it's past the return date I can't return the product, so I'm stuck -$60 and without a vacuum. I'd like to send it in for a repair somehow, or at least warn anyone who buys it that they shouldn't leave it charging for more than a few hours so this doesn't happen to you. Incredibly disappointed as I rely on this to keep my car looking nice for clients.
customer_reviews.author: Bridge

customer_reviews.title: Works great for 1 month.. then
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum was great and worked well for a month. Then it would not turn on at all. I tried charging it overnight and still nothing at all. I always took great care of it, cleaning it out after every use. Now I'm a couple weeks past my return date so I'm out $45 and no vacuum. I read some good and bad reviews before purchasing the vacuum and was optimistic about it, being a good name brand, but after this I will not buy another Bissell. Disappointed to say the least. Update.. contacted Bissell and they did send me a new one. Fingers crossed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement for my old hand held vacuum. Decided to try this one. I'm very happy with it. It did a good job removing the dog hair from on the couch and car seats and floor mats. I have problems with my hands and wrists and had not a problem handling this while vacuuming the whole the car.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Skrodzki

customer_reviews.title: Best handheld vacuum I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the couches and bed to remove dog hair. Does not lose suction and the battery lasts forever before needing a charge. All the attachments are easy to use and get into all the tight spaces between and under furniture. If you have pets, you must get this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay D.

customer_reviews.title: This was my 2nd Bissell Pet Hair Eraser Vacuum to ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my 2nd Bissell Pet Hair Eraser Vacuum to order. The 1st one lasted almost 2yrs before the battery died. I got this 2nd one today and charged the battery for the time the instructions stated. The red light went off and i figured it was charged. Nope....it was DEAD!!! I got a new vacuum that never worked. Not really deserving of even one star. I tried to call their customer service only to be put on terminal hold. Amazon gets the 5 stars!!! They answered right away and put thru refund for both the vacuum and the warranty. Thank you Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy JJ

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst products I’ve bought. First of all, IF it will charge (most of the time it doesn’t charge, although I see the red light has gone off), it doesn’t stay charged more than 10-15 minutes tops. I plug it in to charge and at some point the red light goes off and it never charged. If it charges, it picks up pet hair on the floors but not from furniture-even using various attachments. I’m sorry I ever bought this awful product.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: This was a nice product until we used it
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice product until we used it. We literally used it a handful of times and it worked great but it just stopped working!?! We tried to replace it but our return window was up. We were hoping we just got a dud but we are not willing to take a chance on another since the same thing might happen?! Plus it is not totally cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Huber

customer_reviews.title: USELESS.
customer_reviews.text: Functioned adequately for about a week before it decided that it preferred to flash it's light and die after a moment of spinning up. I've read somewhere it could be an issue with hair getting into the motor, though the only hair I've picked up so far are fairly short dog hairs (<1" in length) so it's disappointing that a PET HAIR ERASER vacuum would fail so miserably at the only thing it was meant to do. I disassembled the unit to see if any hair had become tangled in the parts. Nothing. No hair. I honestly haven't a clue as to how or why this thing stopped working. Probably a faulty battery unit.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepsteaks

customer_reviews.title: Great, until the suction fails.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this vacuum cleaner for a month and a half. When it was brand new, it was great. The suction was strong enough to take care of pet hair. I had no complaints. I kept it clean, took good care of it, and still, here I am, less than two months later, it has literally no suction power. I'm guessing it's a battery issue, but I'm seriously disappointed in the performance of this product. If this is the vacuum you're interested in, do yourself a favor and buy a cheaper alternative that probably will surpass this model in quality and longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked great for about two months and stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I was over the moon excited for this vacuum. It worked great for about two months and stopped working. I cleaned it out but it wasn't sucking the fur up. Quite frustrating. After a few tries and nothing, I threw it out. It was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Swede

customer_reviews.title: It Does Indeed Erase Pet Hair
customer_reviews.text: I am a recipient of a 3rd Service Dog from Canine Companions for Independence. My big, blonde lab set me adrift in fur. This 3 pound hand vacuum is easy to work and does indeed erase pet hair. This is a hand vacuum folks, with a suction port of around 4 inches you will not want to use this to clean a whole room. I changed out the motorized attachment and the upholstery part made short work of our 'up' chair. The edge tool sucked up stray jibbles. On first use, I declare this an item which does indeed erase pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Franklin Christie

customer_reviews.title: Labrador Hair Vacuum!!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews on this vacuum, most were good, however some said the charge did not last long, I decided to take the chance, I bought it for my car because when my Labrador goes for his ride rides, it needs to be vacuumed. I have had no issues of it running out on a charge. I can vacuum the whole car, front and back, I drive a small SUV. And with the attachments it comes with its and extra plus, an edging tool, and a rotary brush that is great for the large portion of the carpets and the large portion of the seats.........You cant go wrong with this vacuum for the quality and the cost
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product, save your money
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine, for 1 day, 15 mins, decent suction before needing recharging. Second day sluggish motor after full overnight charge, weak power and very low suction. It stopped completely after approx 2-3 minutes. Tested it over three days and every day, after a full overnight charge, same results. After about 10 sessions of this it still has almost zero suction . Bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: When the battery goes, you're done
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well for over a year. Rather suddenly the operating time slows, then within a week or so, it's over. The battery goes from pretty good to no charge at all. You can't replace the battery. This is old battery technology. Not lithium ion but nickel metal hydride I'm sure. I would never buy any portable device without a li-ion battery. I'm sure the newer model with Li-ion battery is a much better investment.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.. I may use this more than my ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent..I may use this more than my upright and cannister. Easy to use and assemble. Good recharge. Keeps it simple! . That''s probably why they are in business so long.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 2 years ago even though there were lots of reviews stating that the unit failed after a short time. Same here. After 2 years and having used the vacuum about 4 times it will only run for about 60 seconds on a full charge. It does a good job on pet hair when it works. It just doesn't work long enough to be useful. I did purchase an extended warranty so I am not out any money. I would recommend the same for anyone that is going to buy one of these.
customer_reviews.author: SteveB

customer_reviews.title: The roller on this vacuum is not the hair-free roller ...
customer_reviews.text: The roller on this vacuum is not the hair-free roller on the Pet Vac upright. It is just the usual brush roller that clogs up with hair. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: kayinwyo

customer_reviews.title: Seven minutes of heaven
customer_reviews.text: After reading so many mixed reviews, I’m very happy with it! I don’t leave it plugged in all the time; I just plug it in when I feel I’ve been using it a lot. Otherwise, the only thing that would work better at making me think I don’t have 2 (crazy) cats, is not having two crazy cats. It’s not going to let you vacuum for 15 minutes but I can quickly get 7 minutes of great vacuuming in at a time and it is picking up everything!
customer_reviews.author: InYourDreams

customer_reviews.title: Works okay on flat surfaces with beater bar, but not great for dog hair on cloth car seats
customer_reviews.text: Since most car seats have rolls to them, I had to press down to get the unit to flatten the seats to get at the dog hair. Probably got 60-70% of the hair. If the beater bar was on a pivoting heat it would have worked better. The suction was fair. If the unit had at least 25% more power I may have been able to get more hair up without the pivoting head. The flat-sided tool that was sent only works if the entire opening of the attachment can remain in contact with the surface. It worked okay for dirt and other trash. The unit is easy to clean and is reasonably quite. The grip is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Terrell

customer_reviews.title: This product really sucks - in a good way!
customer_reviews.text: Now that the cat is gone, this great little vacuum is getting less of a work-out than usual. Long battery life, easy on and off attachments and great suction, this is the ticket. I still have birds - thus feathers and seeds here and there. No problem with this product. Easy to empty and clean. The filter comes apart for easy cleaning if you have an air compressor or canned air. Leave a Kleenex in the pocket and washer is full of Kleenex crumbs? The Bissell is the answer to that problem. Great for removing crumbs from your keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made cordless vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cordless vacuum......with one exception: I would have liked to have had a long-hair brush attachment for cleaning air vents. As it is, I have to use a brush while vacuuming.......something is wrong, here. However, the unit has plenty of suction & the motorized brush works surprisingly well on vehicle carper. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CR Mainwearing

customer_reviews.title: Battery life sucks
customer_reviews.text: Battery life on this thing sucks. I have to charge it after every use. The rotating brush is also quite small, theres about an inch on each side of the brush head that is just plastic. The roatating brush doesn't cover as much ground as you would think from looking at it. It works well though and I havent had any issues with losing suction. I bought this because I have two cats and I was taken by the "pet hair" label in the description. I think almost any handheld vac with rotating brush would work well though. If you're shopping for one just know that you will have to charge this thing after every use.
customer_reviews.author: isabel

customer_reviews.title: Don't over charge and it'll work great!
customer_reviews.text: Works just as expected. I followed the directions and used the vacuum right out of the box until the battery died completely. I don't over charge it, and only leave it plugged in until it's completely charged for 5 hours. I've had the vacuum for almost 2 months and haven't had any issues so far. I use it all around the house, and it worked great on my carpet stairs. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Will not hold a charge after 1 year of use
customer_reviews.text: Product worked fine for 1 year. Now at 16 months of 1 use per week it will only hold a charge for 20-30 seconds. Contacted BISSELL for suggestions. Their response was that there was an internal problem and since it was over a year there was nothing they could do. If you only need to erase pet hair for 1 year, this is the machine for you. If you plan on haven’t your pet longer, don’t waste your hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Crews

customer_reviews.title: Needs longer battery life
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little vacuum cleaner. I mainly got it for my couch since I have 2 dogs who shed ridiculously. But I’ve also used it on my steps and it works wonders. I gave 4 stars instead of 5 because the charge doesn’t last long. It has to charge 5 hrs for abt 30 minutes of operation. It gets annoying to have to keep plugging it in so often. Makes difficult to get a job done in a timely fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquetta C.

customer_reviews.title: Battery is the weak link in this hand vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could leave more stars for this hand vac. I had to buy 2 in the last 18 months - one lasted a year, and one 5 months. When it works, it works GREAT and I love the suction, versatility and ease of use, but the battery simply dies after quite a short time of use (5 months for one, a year for the other). And the battery can't be replaced... Sorry Bissell, I tried to love you, and I did for a while, but I am turning to Dyson. Their equivalent item is admittedly more expensive, but apparently lasts much longer and has a 2 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: baythedog

customer_reviews.title: Must have for pet owner.
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple cats, and one of them is a long hair Persian. This Bissel is a life saver to me. It picks up hair, pieces of cat litters and dust on my bed excellently. The rotating head works well to actually takes out the pet hair. You do have to clean up the rotating head though. I don't understand why some people complain that hair stuck into rotating head, it's a common sense you need to pull our the hair wrapping about the brush. All in all, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: pheobe_s

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: So far, this has made a world of difference on keeping my living room couch clean. My dog's hair sticks to everything, so although she isn't allowed on the couch, just by me playing with her, and her hair sticking to me or my clothes, I then transfer it to the couch when I sit on it. This has been driving me nuts. Now, I pull this little vacuum out every other day, and in just a few minutes, the couch looks great! I don't like that the manufacturer doesn't offer some kind of holder for this, though? I would like to wall mount it for easier storage and charging, but that doesn't seem to be part of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Mahwah Man

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good little vacuum. Easy to handle/manipulate, not too heavy. Suction power pretty good. I actually really like the multiple suction attachments; makes it easy to get into tiny spaces. My only gripe is that it takes a long time to charge and uses up the charge pretty quickly. That said, I suppose that is pretty subjective. My sister said that her cordless handheld vacuum (another brand) held a charge for a pathetic amount of time in comparison. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Huggles

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! Battery is long lasting and it's perfect for ...
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! Battery is long lasting and it's perfect for touch-up and stairs! It's easy to empty the dirt and hair - no struggle - and it holds its suction even when the trap is nearly full. Awesome product - couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Works GREAT! I absolutely love this product!!! Worth every single penny. Very lightweight also. Great quality and I don't know how I ever lived without it! *UPDATE- I bought 2 more of these because they are so awesome. I wanted one for each end of the house (kitchen, upstairs bathroom, etc) . Now I have one in each room of the house and can grab it to quickly clean up messes. Also works well on sofa with dog/cat hair on it. I can't say enough good things about this hand vac!
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Vacuum. *Powerful. *Easy to use. *Durable. *Easy to clean. *Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing vacuum and worth every penny- seriously! I have four inside dogs which shed constantly! The suction is very strong. With a strong suction, I get my cleaning tasks done quickly. Connections are durable. Fast and easy clean up. Washable filter if needed. The weight of the vacuum makes it easy to use. I would HIGHLY recommend this product for ALL pet owners and anyone else who just needs a durable and easy to use vacuum. **My favorite part of this vacuum is the motorized attachment, which is powered by the motor rather than suction like traditional vacuums.**
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Must have for cat owners (picks up cat hair perfectly)
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic handheld for cleaning pet hair. We have a cat and I use this for 2 purposes: I use the long attachment to pickup litter that my cat kicks out of the litter box, and the brush attachment on chairs and furniture to pickup cat hair. Overall this is a great handheld vacumm. I like that it has a cord charge as opposed to a docking station, and what way it is designed is great. You won't have an issue with debris falling out of the vacuum as you switch attachments. I say a must have for cat owners....
customer_reviews.author: amber munshi

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY POOR BATTERY LIFE
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY POOR QUALITY BATTERY!!!!! When fully charged I have just enough battery life to vacuum the staircase in my home and around the perimeter of one hall, and that was upon my second use of this product. On the first use I barely had enough to vacuum my two couches. The vacuum does pick up hair well, but is not a miracle worker. It takes quite a bit of effort to get the job done. One's money may be better spent on another product.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working soon after purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ran into the same problem as everyone else and didn't read the other reviews. After a few months it stops charging and won't hold a charge. Then strangely it reversed and now it literally won't stop. The power button does not turn it off and the only way to stop it is to plug it into the charger again. Definitely is no longer in a useable condition after a few months
customer_reviews.author: Nebula Creatives

customer_reviews.title: Battery is useless - Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product has potential, but unfortunately when it comes to the battery, any potential this product may have had is nonexistent - don’t waste your money. Just as other purchasers have noted (I should have listened) lthe battery does not hold a charge more than 1-5 minutes. My vacuum charge lasts about 5 minutes and then another long charge cycle that achieves nothing except another pitiful 5 minutes of use. Save your money, purchase another brand.
customer_reviews.author: R.E.F.

customer_reviews.title: No complaints! Amazing for cat litter.
customer_reviews.text: I mostly purchased this for daily spot cleaning around the litter box. It picks up litter BEAUTIFULLY. Even from the may designed to trap litter. It also does a pretty good job of picking up pet hair, not incredible but definitely adequate. I can't really speak to battery life because I only use it for about 5 minutes a day and the rest of the time it lives on the charger. It's pretty lightweight and it's easy to clean once it's full. All in all I'm really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ipetzombies

customer_reviews.title: Bless this hand vac.
customer_reviews.text: This is PERFECT for spot cleaning around my guinea pig cage and cleaning inside of it so I don’t have to sweet it. Cleaning it is so easy and I love the different heads. The one I got was “certified like new” but I’m pretty sure it was brand new and the box was just really damaged. Great for cleaning cat hair off the couch and rugs as well. I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend the Pet Eraser
customer_reviews.text: I buy quite frequently on Amazon and this is the first product that I've wanted to write a review about. I am thrilled! I had been cleaning my couch with lint rollers, as my vacuum did not work well given the lack of a proper attachment for this kind of job. I have a very (cute) and fury ragdoll kitten...and as can be imagined, that equates to fur wherever she decides to lay! The Pet Eraser made quick and effective work of couch cleanup! So pleased, I bought one for my mother, who also has pets!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best ever for quick cleanups
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat so it is great for litter box or quick upholstery cleaning of cat hair. I also find that it is my go to cleaning device for bathroom hair and underbed dust bunnies! I kept telling my daughter (who is a bit of a clean freak) how much I was enjoying my gift to myself, so that one day I decided to order one for her too! She loves it! I keep my cord hid and so Bissell is out of sight, she keeps hers right out in the open, and uses it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: quite surprised how well it picked up and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: happy

customer_reviews.title: excellent Pet Hair Picker Upper
customer_reviews.text: Really loving this hand held vacuum. Picks up pet hair and other lint etc very nicely. The only thing I would would hope the company who makes it would work on is letting the charge last longer. I'm charging it every two to three days. Its no big deal. I also don't know if you can leave it plugged in all the time or if it would ruin the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie

customer_reviews.title: Works, but doesn't live long
customer_reviews.text: It works but the battery life is horrible. Constantly dying on me even when I charge it all night. It would be an awesome product if it would live longer .
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Wells

customer_reviews.title: It's powerful and has great suction, and rarely do I have to go ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this hand vac the other day and have used it a few times already. It's powerful and has great suction, and rarely do I have to go over the same spot multiple times to get the pet hair up. Comes with three different attachments and charging cord. My only issue is that I did not realize it takes 5 hours to fully charge the unit, and a full charge only gives you around 20 minutes of use. Not ideal but also not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: thetattooedlady

customer_reviews.title: Super product
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one.I have 8 cats so that means a lot of hair especially on my bed.I use it everynight to vacuum my sheets etc.Plus I can use it in spots where a regular vacuum just cannot get to.Also the price is great.The first one I bought I paid 80.00 and that was on sale and when I saw this one for 36.00 on amazonwarehouse.com I bought it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Melody L. Waller

customer_reviews.title: Not a shop vac
customer_reviews.text: I wrecked my first one by not changing the filter cup, it eventually tore and when I used it on fine paint/plaster dust (should have used the shop vac) it all went in the motor. I tried cleaning the innards and just made it worse. Maybe I can help others as an example of what not to do :-) I bought it to clean the couch but it works great on the car and moving spiders outdoors too.
customer_reviews.author: ideabuzz

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Great for small spaces and dirty homes. I have two pets and this helps get the hair out of corners, rugs, furniture, etc. It is very easy to clean and empty too. I wish the battery life was a bit longer though, but I live in a very small space and it lasts long enough to clean the whole place.
customer_reviews.author: Leah ConstantineTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: User friendly and effective.
customer_reviews.text: I never have written a review on anything! Being my first review, I have to say I love this frickin handheld vacuum. My son hates to vacuum and since the Bissell is smaller and more effective, he ACTUALLY vacuums, instead of lying about his attempts. I vacuumed the smaller rugs in my house, the stairs, under furniture and it died with I was just finishing my cloth seats in the car. That was just out of the box. Mind you, I have a white dog that sheds like she has a thyroid issue and this handheld got it all! I would so recommend this to anyone who needs to get pet hair out of smaller areas.
customer_reviews.author: RNNoodle

customer_reviews.title: IF I COULD GIVE 10 STARS I WOULD.
customer_reviews.text: We have a puppy and a 4 year old this little vac is amazing use to clean car as well. Power brush is great I've used for about 20 min straight doing 2 cars and still had plenty of battery. If I could give 10 stars I would. It beats taking out the dyson for a little clean up
customer_reviews.author: Sgt M

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a week or two then stops holding a ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a week or two then stops holding a charge. Should have listened to lots of other reviews claiming the exact same problem, but took a gamble because its returnable on amazon. Boy am I glad I bought it on amazon, because I sadly had to return it. :(
customer_reviews.author: SuzanneDel

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning, loss of  suction
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacumn a couple years ago. We don't have a pet but wanted something portable for the stairs and general clean up. Recently it wasn't picking anything up. I cleaned the filter and the nozzel to no avail. At this point I disassembled the body, about six screws to expose the motor. What you see is the dirt and fibers caught in the fan veins, causing a lack of air flow. After the cleaning everything was back to normal. Keep it fully charged for the best results.
customer_reviews.author: Richard  Talach

customer_reviews.title: Good for some jobs!
customer_reviews.text: This picks up cat litter, hair and loose dirt like a champ on a floor with no carpet. I bought this to clean my carpeted stairs and for easy clean ups. It doesn't work great on the steps even with the carpet attachment, but I do have long carpet. It is great for cleaning my car though!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Pet Bissell
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I have ever ordered!! I called and they did not help me at all. I am very disappointed in the Bissell products. This is not first problem I have had with Bissell. It has been so long ago that I had the other problem so I thought maybe it had gotten better but I was very disappointed to see it had NOT.I would like to return it but I have gotten no help. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of the best little investments and we use it for so much more than we thought. It was originally purchased just for the steps in the house but the wife loves to use it on the dog beds wit hthe power attachment. It is also great for edges in rooms and the garage when I don't want to break out the bigger vacuum. The suction is really good for its size and so far the battery has been going strong.
customer_reviews.author: JFG

customer_reviews.title: Never powerful enough, and then it just stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: It did a pretty good job picking up hair, but it was never really powerful enough to remove hair from woven couch cushion -- it was too embedded. The problem was that it just doesn't have the power to do it. Weirdly, it didn't have the power to do more than an okay job picking up stuff that isn't pet hair. But the worst problem? One day, 18 months after purchasing it, it just stopped working. The red light turns on but the motor doesn't. I didn't drop it or get it wet, and the battery was fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: TKG

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum, but battery doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I had this vacuum for a few months before the battery would no longer hold a charge. This vacuum was purchased after the model up no longer held a charge. Something seems to be wrong with the batteries on these units. Very disappointed in the lifetime of this vacuum, but it worked well when it actually held a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Comeaux

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Like other people experienced, the vacuum worked great at first, then after it had been plugged in over night it wouldn't stay on for more than 30 seconds. Super disappointing! I was going to send it back but after reading all the reviews I think I'll just buy a different brand. Seems like this company is well aware of the problem and instead of fixing it they'll just keep sending you a different one with the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's great but it doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Had this little vacuum for a little over 2 years. The battery now will no longer hold a charge. We did our best to not leave it charging for hours on end, but it did happen from time to time. Sure leaves you feeling like they build these things to fail so you have to buy a new one. Worked great while it lasted. I used it a lot in our RV. I would be able to vacuum all of the floors, nooks and crannies before the battery died. I liked the hair attachment - it did pretty well at removing pet hair off of furniture, blankets but not perfect. Was easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.author: JodyGirl

customer_reviews.title: It gets all the hair so much better. I’ve also wasted so much money on lint ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog and cat have had fleas for a while and no matter how much vacuuming with a lager vacuum I do I can’t seem to get them all. This product has been a life saver. I’m able to vacuum the couch much quicker and more efficiently. It gets all the hair so much better. I’ve also wasted so much money on lint rollers for hair over the years. This thing is so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Brandyx3

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy a Bissel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum in May of this year. I used it to vacuum up pet hair and sand from my truck. The suction isn't very good but works....the problem is I only got about 10 uses out of it before the battery died. For good. The vacuum looks new but its just a poorly made product. This is my second Bissell product and have to say that they produce junk. My advice is spend a little more, don't buy cordless unless it's a Dyson...and avoid Bissell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 dogs & this works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a beagle and a boxer-pit. They both sleep on the couch at night when we go to bed. Although I keep sheets on the couch but hair still sticks. This vacuum cleaned up so nicely. In addition I have carpet on my stairs and this vaccum did so well. Battery life was about 20 min when off the charger. I was able to accomplish my vacuuming in time. Charges quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Love

customer_reviews.title: Unable to hold a charge. Got one decent use ...
customer_reviews.text: Unable to hold a charge. Got one decent use out of the product before it died and since has been unable to work for longer than a couple of minutes. Extensions already falling a part after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah-Grace Crocco

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working a few months later
customer_reviews.text: I loved this vacuum but just like some Of the other reviews said... the vacuum stops working after a few months. We even tried changing the filter and buying a new charger. I would look at it as a $50 a year investment if you guys want to buy this product. It doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.author: happajennybug

customer_reviews.title: Major battery problems.
customer_reviews.text: First I would like to say that this vacuum is amazing and works great for picking up all dog hair around the house with ease. Unfortunately, after just a couple weeks the battery life began to diminish significantly. Now, only after a month or so the battery life won't even last 2 full minutes. I enjoyed the product so much that I am actually going to buy another unit and hope the battery holds up better because it is by far the best product I have used for picking up pet hair. I would have gladly given it 5 stars but due to the battery problems I have it 2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needed it badly
customer_reviews.text: I just had my bathroom redone with a white floor. I also have 4 bunnies upstairs next to the bathroom. So I have to vacuum this floor every day (hay, bunny fur, dust). This vac is so handy - can just keep it in the bathroom to use. I also have found another good use for it - my stairs. Nice since I don't have to lug a heavy vac up and down the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Upears

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Easy to Clean Vacuum and totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum purchase I ever made. I never thought I’d get excited over a vacuum but this little hand vac truly gets the job done. It’s great with dog hair and the different nozzle attachments are perfect to get any job done. The battery life is good. Perfect for crevices in the couch, toddler crumb pickup, houses that get dust bunnies quickly. Huge fan.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Keefer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little vac
customer_reviews.text: Love that its powerful and portable. From requests, bought two more for my relatives for their birthdays. It’s perfect for vacuuming my long hair (we have no pets! 😃) and great for small spaces. Don’t need to haul out the big vacumn. We use this almost every day. The battery life is pretty short, so we just charge it, that’s pretty simple too.
customer_reviews.author: Lilmommad

customer_reviews.title: Disposable Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect to get more than a couple of years out of this before the battery will no longer hold a charge. From reading some of the other reviews I consider myself lucky, a lot of other people had theirs die much more quickly. If you don't mind investing $50 for a 2 year vacuum then this is for you, otherwise spend a little extra to get a good quality one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Uhles

customer_reviews.title: Battery dies and unit stops working
customer_reviews.text: Well it worked like a charm until the battery just died. Contacted Bissell, the serial reflected it was "made in 2016" which extends further than the one year warrantee. Got a silly 20% off next purchase off their website only. Sure, thank you for the discount though dying batteries do sound like a surefire way to keep customers buying off you. Silly
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Just "ok", lasted for 3 years
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a Dirt Devil with this. It did not have the suction power of the Dirt Devil, but we liked the roller brush. Keep in mind that the roller only picks up a 3 inch path, even though the roller is 4.5 inches. So you can't do large areas- even our dog's bed took forever. Just after 3 years it started to slow down, now we are throwing it out, it starts up, then stops immediately- useless. Be nice if these products last at least 5 years!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 MONTHS!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum in September and after 2 months, it does not work anymore. I charged it overnight thinking it would help and nope! It doesn’t hold the charge for more than 15 seconds. Seems to be an ongoing issue since most of the reviews state the same thing...I was hoping mine would be different but I’m out of luck now that it’s past the return date. I would like the company to reach out to me to resolve this (one of the reviews said a customer experiencing the same battery issue received a replacement vacuum)
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pups
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I am pleasantly surprised at how well this little machine works. It does an incredible job at getting all the puppy messes up, from our little guy's fur to little bits of edible chews left behind. It is pretty powerful and I am always surprised at how much dirt is in the container when I am done. I would definitely recommend this product to puppy parents.
customer_reviews.author: Kita

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Filters not cheap, you if need to replace them often.
customer_reviews.text: Wife says it works quite well with two dogs that shed on furniture, and as a "dustbuster" for our cars' interiors. She is a clean fanatic, so also cleans or replaces filters regularly on all devices. I ordered this vacuum from Amazon 2 Sep 2017, and today she insisted that I order replacement pleated filters for it. Be aware those are $10.49 apiece from Bissell plus shipping; you can't just order a pleated filter without the housing to which it attaches. Part # is 1608653
customer_reviews.author: Clay W

customer_reviews.title: Best hand held vacuum for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this thing. Perfect for quick pick and it really does amazing work on pet hair. We have an Australian Shepard that doesn't stop shedding ever and it can pick up her hair on furniture and in the car like it is nothing. Absolutely love how well it works. The battery life is decent too. Could run for a couple hours it seems.
customer_reviews.author: LKP Tackett

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: Don't have stairs so I comment on this part. It has good suction. I really like the roller attachment. I keep it on all the time to vacuum. I use it mainly on furniture. It's very quiet too. It's very easy to dump the hair and dirt. I like this hand held vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Chambers

customer_reviews.title: I was constantly annoyed with dog hair on my couch and bed
customer_reviews.text: I was constantly annoyed with dog hair on my couch and bed, but didnt want to make my dog stay off. This was the perfect solution. The motorized brush head works wonders. About every two days or so I turn this thing on, vacuum up the couch and bed spread, and we're done. Takes less than a minute. This is exactly what I wanted and it delivered.
customer_reviews.author: David Clayton

customer_reviews.title: I am pretty disappointed being a first time bissell bustomer
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty disappointed being a first time bissell bustomer. I charged the unit for five hours as the directions suggested. I was surprised that it lost its ability to function after only THIRTY SECONDS. Needless to say I am very upset that I waited so long for the item to be delivered only to have it not work at all. I will definitely be trying other companies instead. It's overall performance is an epic failure.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Scott

customer_reviews.title: Works well for price
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Needs cleaned often and the cleaning process requires a screw driver and hand sanitizer. It's held up well to my golden retriever who is the ultimate shedder, and his little buddy jelly bean. Picture shows me vacuuming the golden, but don't do that unless it's already pretty clogged up and not sucking hard. Else it really grabs his skin ASK HIM HOW HE KNOWS. Ha ha.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kline

customer_reviews.title: It won't recharge the battery.
customer_reviews.text: And it is just a year old. Works for about 2 seconds and then it is off. Very disappointing for $50.00. And I wish I would have read the reviews before I bought it. It is hard to say anything good about something that still looks new and does not work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: K Larson

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere, doesn't hold a charge.
customer_reviews.text: I can't return this anymore so I'll give it a 1 star. It worked fine the first 3 times of use. I've had it for a little over a month now and it can't even hold a charge. It doesn't even turn green to indicate it's fully charged after 5 or even 7 hours of charging. It only lasts up to 2 minutes of use and then turns off. If I could, I would return this piece of crap. Such a waste of $55. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cely

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and easy
customer_reviews.text: Beat price here on amazon. It’s really convenient and I use it everyday. I’m picks up really well. Battery is as expected. Only complaint is no stand available for it as my old shark had. I do use all the attachments, and it’s east to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Stine

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but it let me down!
customer_reviews.text: Ran across this machine I purchased in 2017 while cleaning out closets this weekend and was reminded what a disappointment it was, so I thought I’d leave a review. Didn’t even work for an entire year after I got it. Wouldn’t hold a charge. Ordered a new chord from bissell. Still wouldn’t charge so I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Grear little vaccum, but long charge time.
customer_reviews.text: I like this vacuum because it can pick up every little piece of hair that you didn't even know you had in your room. The chatge lasted for me tk be able ti vacuum three rooms. It is powerful and the attachments are great. I'm giving it four stars because it takes approximately five hours to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Queen

customer_reviews.title: Battery died after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in January of 2017 and it promptly died in January of 2020. Maybe that's normal? I just called our vacuum repair shop and they said the batteries cannot be replaced, so now this is just another hunk of plastic (and lithium?) headed for the landfill. I'd hoped they had that battery technology worked out by now. I guess not, so I will be getting a small handheld with a cord next. Even at it's peak, this thing was, ironically, only so-so for getting pet hair off of the couch and bedspread. It was much better for chasing corner dust bunnies and sucking up eraser crumbs and the like.
customer_reviews.author: M. M. Madden

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging
customer_reviews.text: One year in, the battery stopped charging. And it isn’t replaceable. Why would bissell make this with a non-replaceable battery? And by design, it doesn’t work plugged in. So it just doesn’t work. I’ve not abused it-I use it about once a month and clean it after.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Whitney

customer_reviews.title: I was replacing and old cordless with this one and am sorry to say this was not a good choice.
customer_reviews.text: this worked really well at first but with in 30 days it would not hold a charge anymore and I had to buy a knew one. I read the instructions before doing the first charge just to make sure I took proper care of it. I was replacing and old cordless with this one and am sorry to say this was not a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I used it, it worked great. MY dog has very fine fur and it picked up everything. The moment it died, I plugged it in to charge it.I charged it fro about 5 hours, until the red light went off. I went to use it again and it won't hold a charge longer than a minute. I've tried looking online for ways to fix this problem and nothing works. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna Baird

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, picks up everything!
customer_reviews.text: This handheld vacuum is very powerful and easy to use. We got it to clean up after our rabbits, so our primary concern isn't hair, but poo and hay. The rolling attachment works well on rugs and seems to pick up everything. I also like the crevice tool for cleaning up hard to reach messes. It's light and very easy to use. I also started using it to clean up after a painting project. Our old handheld vacuum just wasn't doing much, but this did a great job at picking up all the dust around our baseboards that our broom missed.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine

customer_reviews.title: Item broke and they did not honor the warranty. Stay away.
customer_reviews.text: This item broke after 6 months owning it. I says it has a 1 year warranty on the amazon product page. I contacted Amazon and they said that they will not refund me and warranties have to be received from the manufacturer. I contacted Bissell and they refused to honor their warranty and were extremely rude to me. This item will break and you will not get a replacement or refund. This was the worst experience I've ever had with a product on Amazon. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ori O.

customer_reviews.title: The unit is well designed with the needed attachments for ...
customer_reviews.text: The unit is well designed with the needed attachments for application to flat surfaces and nooks and crannies. My only complaint is the battery life is not sufficient to complete the cabin of a medium truck or sedan. Approximately 25 min and the battery is depleted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The pet ereaser is a life saver in cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Pet hair eraser works wonderful. I found the part I was missing in the box under the cardboard. That was just a flat surface cleaner head and it makes a big difference. Rather than using the furniture if carpet roller. Just need extra filters which I am having a hard time finding. With my little puggle you can't believe how much she sheds. The pet ereaser is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Bennet-Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic at picking up fur - wish it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic at picking up pet hair from the bed but died after the first charge. Turned itself off after every 2 seconds. Had to return and look for a new vacuum. Wishing new vacuum can pick up hair as good as this but also need a hose for the car too.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfie

customer_reviews.title: Would not shut off
customer_reviews.text: I have this Pet Hair Eraser Cordless Hand Vacuum only since August 2017. Up until last night when I used it, really loved it. Then while vacuuming, it would not shut off. Finally my husband had to take it apart and cut the wires inside. Our dog was scared when it kept running and running. I think Bissell should stand good for this product for it had a short life. Like to hear from you. I have other Bissell products and never no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working - Only used 10-15 times since purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this Bissell a dozen times since purchased in 2017. The last couple times it took a while to fire up and tried to use it again yesterday - useless! I researched a good pet hair remover to use for our King bed when our two dogs sleep with us - they usually sleep in their crates and rarely sleep/play in our bed - this is why it has only been used so rarely. And it looks like I am unable to to return the item :(
customer_reviews.author: Theresa St.Pierre Riggs

customer_reviews.title: I also use it on a small carpet by my door and my bathroom rugs and it does great. It holds a charge even after leaving it ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this is January of 2017 and I have zero complaints. It takes no time at all to clean my couch that is covered in golden retriever hair! It makes quick work of my non carpeted steps as well. I also use it on a small carpet by my door and my bathroom rugs and it does great. It holds a charge even after leaving it plugged in for long periods of time. This little thing has saved me so much time and energy!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Good for Dog Hair on Furniture
customer_reviews.text: I like that it comes with various tools for cleaning/picking up dog hair on furniture, but I wouldn't use it as a primary in the car. If I do use it on the interior of my car, its mainly for the carpets. I have a seat protector for my seats where my dogs sit in my car so I don't use the vacuum on the seats.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Star

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after three months
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this product it worked great! I only used it to remove the dog hair from my sectional couch and a few small rugs. The product was used for very light work. Overall I was pleased. However within three months of buying the product it quit working all together. We did all kinds of troubleshooting, trying to restore the products function with no luck. The vac turns on, but doesn’t vacuum anything up leaving it useless. The battery life is unimpressive to say the least as well. I was disappointed to learn I was outside the window to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Karley Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Get's the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I got this one to replace my old hand vacuum that died on me. I choose this one because I have to vacuum my furniture because of my cat, sheds like crazy after winter. I can say this vacuum does a good job, and the battery last long time. I haven't been able to make it completely powerless yet. I'm able to do my couch, lazy boy, and a couple rugs and one charge. I normally charge it after each use but I could probably charge it after every-other use.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: OK but a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is ok. It is a little heavy for a handvac. I have 2 labradors and the vacuum does descent. There is another brand with Black Decker that does a better job, but that one usually last about 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Curious Mind 39

customer_reviews.title: Removes hair but has a faulty power button
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum works well at removing pet hair from furniture with the beater bar attachment. However, it is prone to being turned off and on via static shock when running it. I have only had mine for 3 months and the power button now no longer turns the vacuum off. If I want to turn the vacuum off after turning it on, I have to plug it in to the charger which causes it to turn off. Not very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Dippery

product_meta.title: Bissell, 1782 Pet Hair Eraser Cordless Hand and Car Vacuum
product_meta.description: Style:Hand Vacuum OnlyThe Bissell pet hair eraser hand vacuum is developed for pet parents to help make cleaning up after their pets easier. This lightweight and cordless handheld device allows you to clean up pet hair and dirt that collects on your furniture, carpet, in your car, or wherever your furry friends play. The detachable motorized brush helps capture more embedded dirt and pet hair, providing a deeper clean. The included crevice tool and upholstery tool can be used separately or stacked together to combine their usefulness. In addition, this hand vacuum has a two-staged filtration system designed to help extend the life of the filter and provide easier cleaning.
feature_bullets: BISSELL Pet Hair Eraser hand vacuum is cordless, to clean wherever your pet goes
Motorized foot provides powerful suction for a deeper clean. Power Rating : 14.4 Volts
Crevice tool helps clean hard-to-reach areas and tight spaces. Telescoping Extension Wand
Upholstery tool cleans soft surfaces and furniture with felt by attracting more pet hair; Easy-to-Empty dirt bin to help get rid of pet hair easily
Dual-action filtration system; Includes one-year limited warranty; Dirt Cup Capacity: 0.7 L

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars2,801 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
